title: Action Bronson Interview
itunes:title: Action Bronson Interview
description:
Action Bronson discusses dropping 40 lbs, his decision to start singing, his new album and his hope for a collaboration with Pitbull.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
